page.title: 17OUR CLUBS
page.content: In our class of nine and ten year old children many attend clubs in the evening.A large group belongs to Brownies and Cub Scouts.They enjoy many activities,especially camping.Others belong to a Youth Club and play football, snooker,sponge ball,cricket and have discos.Sports are very popular.Ben is in Taunton Athletic Club and does exercises and weight training as well as sprinting.Two learn Judo techniques of correct holds for self defence.Four go to tennis coaching sessions. Two belong to Deane Dolphins Swimming Club where swimming strokes are practised and galas held. Martin plays five a side football for two hours each Friday.Hannah plays her clarinet in Taunton Concert Band.Beth sings in Taunton Children's Choir.Sarah is in both Red Cross and Church Brigade.
